name: Grim-gut Grumblespittle
personality_traits: Obsessed with finding the perfect coin
Believes he once had a noble title
Constantly quotes ancient poetry, but never gets the lines right
Claims to have fought in every major battle of the last three centuries
backstory_short: Once a knight of Aethermoor, Grim-gut was reduced to begging after being struck by a wandering wild magic storm. He insists that his misfortune is merely a test of his courage and that someday he'll return to his rightful place among the nobility.
